transcript:
Customer: Hello ha ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Ashish sir phone cut gaya beech mein main ye bol raha hu sir ho sakta hai shayad aapko call kar raha ho aur aapne connect nahi kar pa rahe the right.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ab mujhe ek cheez mujhe bataye profile aap hi dekhte hai India mart ki.
Customer: Yes sir aapki voice break ho rahi hai.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai aapko meri awaz.
Customer: Ha ha bataiye sir. 
Executive: Main ye profile aap hi dekhte hai India mart ki.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir awaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha ha aa rahi hai bataiye. Abhi saaf aa rahi hai na ye.
Executive: Ha abhi sahi aa rahi hai. Main ye puch raha hu sir ye profile aap hi dekhte hai India mart ki.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Uses aap hi karte hai na pura handle aap hi karte hai India mart aapki taraf se. 
Customer: Ha ji sir.
Executive: Ji ek cheez mujhe confirm karaiye sir jaise abhi main dekh pa raha hu aapki na maxi services run kar rahi hai India mart se currently. Theek hai. Aur maxi services ke andar sir agar main dekhu yaha par ja ke to aapka jo engagement hai India mart ke portal pe engagement matlab jo uses hai wo kafi kam hai. Pichle three four months to kya specific reason hai sir matlab kya. 
Customer: Sir actually main aisa tha na isme aisa tha ki abhi na actually main leave pe tha teen mahine ke liye. Aur abhi koi isko access nahi kar pa raha tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Ha ji ha ji sir boliye sun raha hu main. Ha actually main na leave pe tha teen mahine ke liye aur jo hamare marketing wala ka kam karta hai wo bhi usne bhi job chhod di hai. To abhi India mart ko use nahi kar raha tha yaha pe sir iska. 
Executive: Nahi sir matlab aisa nahi hai ki bilkul bhi use nahi hua hai matlab august ki agar main baat karu to august mein aur september mein use to hua hai sir but ratio is quite low matlab to aapki absence mein bhi koi use kar raha tha matlab ye profile. 
Customer: Sir ye office mein use ho rahi thi to actually jo yaha pe matlab aur bhi staff hai na hamara to wahi matlab wahi log isko thoda bahut matlab manage kar rahe the calling wagera thoda bahut karna matlab aapke hisab se. To matlab mainly sir ye India mart jo hai wo aap hi handle karte hai right isme. 
Executive: Ha ha main aaj hi login kiya hai maine. 
Customer: Aaj hi login kiya hai iske andar. 
Executive: Ha ha. To ek cheez sir main aapko jankari de deta hu matlab kyuki aap jaise bata rahe hai aap chutti pe the because of jo bhi reason hai aapka aapki activity sir kyuki teen mahine se nahi kam dikha rahi hai. Aur jis wajah se sir aapki profile ki jo listing hai sir wo thodi bahut impact bhi ho rahi hai India mart pe. 
Customer: Ji sir. 
Executive: Theek hai. Dusra agar main baat karu to jo India mart bar ki call bhi aa rahi hai na sir theek hai wo isi number pe aa rahi hai ye number wahi hai na p double nine jiske end mein hai sir aapka. 
Customer: Ha ha ye number wahi hai sir theek hai. To pehli baat to sir ye hai ki yaha par sirf aap hi ke number update hai. To agar koi buyer call kar raha hai in case agar aap busy hai to wo call to miss chal jayegi sir aapki. To aisa nahi hai aap yaha par kuch aur number add kar sakte hai. 
Customer: Ye number office mein hi tha ye office ka number hai basically hamare. To ye office mein hi work kar raha tha is time pe to matlab isse call pick nahi payi thi maine kal hi join kiya hai na dobara se teen mahine baad. 
Executive: Okay. Achcha achcha ye office ka hi number tha matlab office koi aur pick kar raha tha sir isme. 
Customer: Ha ha main kal hi join kiya kal join karke maine fir apne phone mein dali hai aur aaj maine India mart login kiya. 
Executive: Fir bhi sir ek bar ratio dekh lena aapka matlab calls ka ratio aapki absence mein agar koi pick bhi kar raha hai baki call ka ratio na kafi dropped hua hai agar main october ki baat karu aapki to october mein total 22 calls aapke pass aayi thi jisme se 50% call miss ho gayi hai. Aur agar main is month ki baat karu november chal raha hai abhi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was on leave for 3 months.

- No one was accessing the account.

- Call ratio has dropped.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about low engagement on portal.

- Executive informed about profile impact due to inactivity.

- Executive informed about missed calls due to single number.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, engagement, missed calls, inactivity
